void.string: select id, name, description from fnbl_module
select id, name, description from fnbl_module where id=?
select smc.connector, sc.name, sc.description, sc.admin_class from fnbl_module_connector smc, fnbl_connector sc where smc.module=? and smc.connector=sc.id
select ssst.id, ssst.description, ssst.class, ssst.admin_class from fnbl_sync_source_type ssst, fnbl_connector_source_type scsst where scsst.connector=? and ssst.id=scsst.sourcetype
select sss.uri, sss.config, sss.sourcetype, sss.name from fnbl_sync_source sss, fnbl_sync_source_type ssst where sss.sourcetype=? and sss.sourcetype=ssst.id
select ssst.id, ssst.description, ssst.class, ssst.admin_class from fnbl_sync_source_type ssst where ssst.id=?
